admin/storefront-permissions.description: Gerenciamento de perfis de acesso e usuários
admin/storefront-permissions.tab.roles.f: Não foi possível encontrar nenhum app conectado às permissões da loja
admin/storefront-permissions.title: Permissões da loja
admin/storefront-permissions.alert-pick: Você precisa selecionar um centro de custo antes de salvar as alterações
admin/storefront-permissions.help.title: How it works
admin/storefront-permissions.help.text1: Role Names can be renamed, but categories are fixed.
admin/storefront-permissions.help.catego: Can manage quotations, sales, and users from the its Organization.
It can have different access levels.
Can belong to one or many organizations.
Sales users can only manage Sales roles.
Sales user hierarchy: sales-admin > sales-manager > sales-representative
Have access and can manage its own organization.
Customers users can only manage users under the Customers roles.
Customers users hierarchy: customer-amin > customer-approver > customer-buyer
